title: Finetuning Granite 7b model using Instructlab and LORA
author: Shilpa Hegde, Krish Hashia
description: This asset demostrates the method of finetuning IBM granite model using Instructlab and LORA on custom dataset.It also involves inferencing on finetuned model along with evaluation of results. As this needs GPU support, please download the repo to run.
